column4: Alright, I downloaded an ISO that burned a bad disk.  Last time this happened to me, I did something with Bittorrent that fixed it for me, but I forgot how that worked now, and I can't find the link to download ubuntu using bittorrent on the new Download page.
well presumably you could download the torrent and open it and then have it save to the same spot and since it hash checks all the pieces, it would correct anything that is off
same place you downloaded it, just scroll down and select the torrent
